00001 #ifndef _HcalCellIndex_hh_
00002 #define _HcalCellIndex_hh_
00003 
00004 #include <CellIndex.hh>
00005 #include <sstream>
00006 
00007 #include "EncodingStringHelper.hh"
00008 
00009 #define SHIFT_I 6
00010 #define SHIFT_J 15
00011 #define SHIFT_KAI SHIFT_LAYER
00012 
00013 #define MASK_I (unsigned int) 0x00007FC0
00014 #define MASK_J (unsigned int) 0x00FF8000
00015 #define MASK_KAI MASK_LAYER
00016 
00017 #define SHIFT_PAD_ROW SHIFT_J
00018 #define MASK_PAD_ROW  MASK_J
00019 
00020 #define SHIFT_PAD_COL SHIFT_I
00021 #define MASK_PAD_COL  MASK_I
00022 
00023 namespace CALICE {
00027   class HcalCellIndex: public CellIndex {
00028     public:
00029     HcalCellIndex (UInt_t pad_row      /*J*/, 
00030                    UInt_t pad_column   /*I*/, 
00031                    UInt_t layer        /*K*/)
00032      : CellIndex((pad_row << SHIFT_PAD_ROW) | ( pad_column << SHIFT_PAD_COL) | ( (layer-1) << SHIFT_LAYER))
00033     { };
00034     
00035     HcalCellIndex (UInt_t geometrical_cell_index) : CellIndex(geometrical_cell_index) {};
00036     
00037 
00040     UInt_t getTileRow() const {
00041       return getPadRow();
00042     };
00043 
00044 
00047     HcalCellIndex &setTileRow(UInt_t tile_row /*J*/) {
00048      setPadRow(tile_row);
00049      return *this;
00050     };
00051 
00052 
00055     UInt_t getTileColumn() const {
00056       return getPadColumn();
00057     };
00058 
00059 
00062     HcalCellIndex &setTileColumn(UInt_t tile_column /*I*/) 
00063     {
00064      setPadColumn(tile_column);
00065      return *this;
00066     };
00067 
00070     static std::string getEncodingString(const unsigned int startbit) {
00071       
00072       std::ostringstream EncodingString;
00073     
00074       EncodingString << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("I",MASK_I,SHIFT_I,startbit)
00075                      << "," 
00076                      << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("J",MASK_J,SHIFT_J,startbit)
00077                      << ","
00078                      << EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc("K-1",MASK_KAI,SHIFT_KAI,startbit);
00079     
00080       return EncodingString.str();
00081     
00082     }
00083 
00084   };
00085 
00086   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, 
00087                          const CALICE::HcalCellIndex& hci) {
00088 
00089     out << "I (column): " << hci.getTileColumn() 
00090         << " J (row): " << hci.getTileRow()
00091         << " K (layer): " << hci.getLayerIndex()
00092       ;
00093     
00094     return out;
00095 
00096   }
00097 
00098 
00099 }
